description:
Kazuma, Kawachi, and Suwabara depart for France to train under Meister Kirisaki’s younger sister, Sophie. But when they learn that her bakery is being threatened, they decide to help her fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En route pour la France ! Visons la Coupe de Monaco !
Now, to France!! Aiming for the Monaco Cup!
มุ่งสู่ฝรั่งเศส! เป้าหมายคือโมนาโคคัพ!
いざフランス!! 目指せモナコカップ!
